Class Catalog

java.lang.Object
  Catalog
public class Catalog
extends Object

This class models a product catalog. It contains a collection of Product objects.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
author name
See Also:
Product

          Constructs an empty catalog.

          Adds a Product object to this catalog.

          Returns the number of products in this catalog.

          Returns the Product object with the specified code.
 Iterator getProductsIterator()
          Returns an iterator over the products in this catalog.

getProduct

public Product getProduct(String code)
Returns the Product object with the specified code.

Parameters:
code - a product code.
Returns:
The Product object with the specifed code. Returns null if there are no products in this catalog with the specifed code.
